activities: We manufacture and distribute health supplements. We collect personal information from customers when they order products from us or sign up as a distributor. Personal information we collect includes first and last names, addresses, billing information, email address, phone numbers and other personal information that allows us to fulfill our obligations to customers and distributors.
contacttitle1: Associate General Counsel and Chief Privacy Officer
corpofftitle1: Associate General Counsel and Chief Privacy Officer
eucountries: Austria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data covered by our organization's self-certification includes personal data provided to us by customers, distributors and employees.
privacyprograms: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
